thread.title: Houston Astros set American League Division Series roster
thread.title_full: Houston Astros set American League Division Series roster

title: Houston Astros set American League Division Series roster
text:
Tweet KANSAS CITY, Missouri - 
The Houston Astros take on the Kansas City Royals in the best-of-five American League Division Series. The Astros won the regular season series 4-2. 
Manager A.J. Hinch announced the starting pitchers for the first three games. Collin McHugh (19-7, 3.89 ERA) will start game 1, followed by Scott Kazmir (7-11, 3.10 ERA) in game 2. Dallas Keuchel (20-8, 2.48 ERA), who won the wild card game on Tuesday against New York, will start game 3 in Houston. 
Hinch said either Lance McCullers or Mike Fiers will start game four if necessary. Quick Clicks
